content:
Strawberries and blueberries are a match made in heaven, and they'll pair perfectly with your chosen citrus fruits. Fresh berries from the farmer's market are always a treat, and their sweetness will complement the tanginess of the citrus nicely.

Here's a suggestion for your fruit kebabs:

* Alternate strawberries and blueberries on the skewer to create a colorful and visually appealing pattern.
* Add a few slices of your chosen citrus fruit (e.g., orange, grapefruit, or tangerine) between the berries to add a burst of citrus flavor and texture.
* Consider adding a few fresh mint leaves or a sprig of rosemary to the kebab for a refreshing and fragrant touch.

Tips for preparing your berries:

* Wash the berries gently and pat them dry with a paper towel to remove excess moisture.
* Hull the strawberries and remove any stems or leaves.
* If using blueberries, you can leave them whole or cut them in half depending on their size and your desired texture.

Now, go ahead and create your delicious fruit kebabs! Enjoy the perfect combination of sweet, tangy, and refreshing flavors
